name: In-Context-LoRA/couple-profile.safetensors
title: Couple Profile
demo_prompt: This two-part image portrays a couple of cartoon cats in detective attire; [LEFT] a black cat in a trench coat and fedora holds a magnifying glass and peers to the right, while [RIGHT] a white cat with a bow tie and matching hat raises an eyebrow in curiosity, creating a fun, noir-inspired scene against a dimly lit background.
description: A Lora model designed to generate images of a couple of cartoon cats in detective attire, capturing a noir-inspired scene.

name: aidmaMJ6.1-FLUX-v0.4.safetensors
title: Aidma MJ6.1 FLUX v0.4
description: A Lora model designed for generating images with a specific aesthetic, version 0.4.
demo_prompt: Anime art,, Fisheye lens photo of a young girl, looking up at the camera. She is of Caucasian descent, with vibrant red hair cascading down her shoulders in loose waves.  Her expressive eyes, accentuated by perfectly arched eyebrows, convey a mixture of playful surprise and mischievous delight.  Sheâ€™s positioned slightly off-center, her body angled three-quarters towards the viewer, with a slight tilt of her head adding to her charming nonchalance. She wears a sleek, black off-the-shoulder corset, the fabric appearing smooth and slightly glossy, clinging elegantly to her figure.  Large, gold loop earrings dangle against her jawline, catching the light.  Her stance is relaxed, yet poised, suggesting a confident and spirited personality. The background is black, providing a calming contrast to her fiery hair and the bold black of her dress. The lighting is dramatic, highlighting her features with a spotlight effect, while the background remains dark. The overall style realistic, vibrant twist, employing bold lines, exaggerated features, and a playful, slightly surreal atmosphere.  The palette is rich and saturated, with the red hair acting as a focal point against the cool teal background.  The texture is smooth on the dress, contrasting with the slightly more textured representation of her hair. The piece is rendered with a slight sense of depth, using subtle shading and highlighting to accentuate her form.  Wide angle lens,  high contrast,  vibrant colors.

name: PASTEL (FLUX).safetensors
title: Pastel Flux
description: A Lora model that focuses on pastel color palettes, ideal for creating soft and dreamy images.
demo_prompt: Cinematic style, realism, cinematic quality, Pastel, A vibrant, futuristic form with smooth curves and a golden sheen that created an otherworldly atmosphere. The night was thick with rain, its rhythmic drumbeats in the tall windows of the old manor mingling with the low hum of jazz drifting through the room. She moved through the crowd like smoke, dark and elusive, in a shimmering dress that seemed to catch the light in all the right places. Her (((mask of delicate black lace: 1.4))), clinging to her skin, revealed just enough to spark the imagination, but hid the most important parts: her eyes. Only her lips were open, painted a shade of red that seemed both dangerous and inviting, like a whispered secret. One that could kill a man. Simple yet captivating, the design caught the light reflections on its surface, adding depth and dimension. This digital work of art embodies modernity while simultaneously awakening curiosity about what lies beyond our consciousness.
